response.overview: This poignant short documentary follows Owney, a 93-year-old Irish man reflecting on his life as he approaches its final chapter. Through his gentle narration, Owney shares heartfelt memories of the place he has called home for his entire life, weaving a tapestry of gratitude and quiet solitude. His words carry a bittersweet tone, filled with wisdom and longing, as he offers touching advice to younger generations: to pause, take in the beauty of the world around them, and cherish the simple blessings life has to offer. With a deep sense of appreciation for all he has experienced, Owneyâ€™s story is a tender reminder of the importance of gratitude and the fleeting nature of time.
response.tagline: A short documentary on the reminiscences of 94 year old Owney McGoldrick on his life in farming the northwest of Ireland.
response.title: Echoes of an Irish Lifetime
